Title: ADNOC LNG offers one cargo loading in 1H October
Description: Abu Dhabiâ€™s state-owned ADNOC LNG has issued a tender to sell one cargo that will load on Oct. 13-15 at its 5.8 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Das Island facility on a free-on-board (FOB) or delivered ex-ship (DES) basis. The tender closes tomorrow.
